main event: A UFO was sighted over Norman Mesa, Nevada on January 4, 1960 at 0312 hours.
interesting points: The object was described as having a blue and bright yellow flame, and appeared like a 'missile' at first.
The object was first seen at an altitude of 20,000 to 22,000 feet and disappeared at the same altitude.
The object was moving in a southwest direction at a very high speed.
The sighting was made by the crews of two commercial airline flights - United Airlines Flight 140 to Denver and Trans World Airlines Flight 207 to Las Vegas.
The analysis concluded that the object was most likely a meteor.
sighted object: A blue and bright yellow flaming object, described as appearing like a 'missile'
witnesses: Crews of United Airlines Flight 140 and Trans World Airlines Flight 207
photographs: No photographs present in the document
